Package view

Interface View

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLI, CLISocket, GUI, GUISocket
    public interface View
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Represents the view component containing methods that mainly provide the client with information about changes in the model, and await user input.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void action1()
      Asks user to select their first action.
      void action2()
      Asks user to select their second action.

      Asks user to input name and colour.

      Notifies all active clients of disconnection.
